activities: Anaplan collects minimal information from users for the purpose of managing user logins.  User name and email address.  Users may also separately enter their own data to be stored on the platform but that data is stored and processed on behalf of the users' use of the platform as customers and not part of the data that Anaplan collects from users.  Data is retained for the duration of the business relationship between Anaplan and the customer.  Anaplan does not use customer data for marketing or other purposes or share with Third Parties without the express written consent of the customer.  Upon termination of the business relationship will be deleted or anytime the customer chooses during the business relationship the customer can delete the data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer data collected on-line through normal use of the platform / application
